title: Chocolate and coffee fondant fancies
description: These sweet treats are so impressive and they taste just fabulous. For this recipe you will need a large heatproof mixing bowl, a handheld electric whisk, a 35x25cm/14x10in Swiss roll tin and a cook’s thermometer.
ingredients: 5 tsp coffee extract (or 2 tsp instant espresso powder dissolved in 25ml/1fl oz boiling water, cooled)
